item.description:
Hi,

Announcing our 1st camping party at Wompatuck State Park:

We have a big campground/multiple sites reserved at Wompatuck State Park in Hingham, just for us.
So lets have some fun!
We can get there around noon - 1pm on saturday and stay over the night for some campfire and delicious s'mores.

Things to bring (more details TBD):
Food: We can cook at the camp, so bring some for yourself and a little to share.
Drinks
Firewood
Stoves
Water
Games to play around the campfire

Personal camping gear: tent, sleeping bag/air mattress, extra blankets, flash light, warm clothing, bug spray. We should look into sharing tents too.

Please bring $5 (cash) per couple to donate to Wompatuck State Park.

Temperatures: High’s in the mid 70’s and lows in the high 50’s, so plan accordingly.

Look for updates to this event.

http://www.mass.gov/d...
http://www.friendsofw...
http://maps.google.co...


Activities :
The park offers a myriad of activities for all outdoor interests including 262 wooded campsites, twelve miles of paved bicycle paths and miles of single track suitable for novice as well as aggressive mountain bikers, wooded bridle paths, and hiking trails. Also, fishing is allowed in the Cohasset Reservoir.
item.how_to_find_us: Call Sun (I will send out my phone number) or Look for a sign at the entrance
item.name: Outdoor Party (camping) at Wompatuck State Park
